item.title: Rob Stewart is my hero.
item.description: Growing up in a land-locked area, I had little exposure to the ocean and the creatures that call it home. So it was a bit unusual that I developed a deep-seated love for the predator of the seas - sharks. The moment I looked past their media-driven reputation as ruthless killers, I discovered their worth. Having evolved over 400 million years ago and surviving the last five mass extinctions, itâ€™s no wonder these animals are highly intelligent super-predators, shaping all oceanic life and ecosystems since their arrival.
